mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_devicein AS i join tb_device AS d on i.device_code = d.device_code JOIN tb_staff AS s ON i.staff_code = s.staff_code JOIN tb_store AS a ON s.store_code = a.store_code JOIN tb_deviceinfo as info on info.dinfo_devicein = i.devicein_code
mapper.insert:
SELECT CONCAT('code', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(dIn.devicein_code,5) AS DECIMAL)+1)) AS deviceinCode ,d.device_code as deviceCode
FROM tb_devicein as dIn ,(SELECT device_code FROM tb_device where device_model=#{deviceModel} and device_type=#{deviceType} and device_color=#{deviceColor} and device_price=#{devicePrice}) as d
INSERT into tb_devicein ( devicein_code ,devicein_serial ,dealler_code ,device_code ,devicein_status ,devicein_stat_date ,devicein_date ,devicein_memo ,staff_code ,devicein_reg_date ) values ( #{deviceinCode} ,#{deviceinSerial} ,#{deviceinDealler} ,#{deviceCode} ,'신규' ,now() ,now() ,#{deviceinMemo} ,#{deviceinStaff} ,now() )
